data.title: Temple of Karnataka
data.meta_description: Temple of Karnataka - Free download as Word Doc (.doc), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The State of Karnataka is known for its multitude of temples built in diverse architectural styles. Major dynasties like the Chalukyas, Gangas, Hoysalas, Vijayanagar Empire, and Wodeyars of Mysore have contributed to the rich variety of temples seen across the state. Key temples include the Virupaksha Temple at Hampi and Chennakesava Temple at Belur representing Vijayanagar style, the Hoysaleswara Temple at Halebidu and Chennakeshava Temple at Somnathpur reflecting intricate Hoysala sculpture, and early Chalukyan structures at Aihole, Pattadakal and Badami.
